name: Cloud Puncher
description:
Created for GBJAM5

Punch through the clouds as you descend toward the dropzone. Your speed, but most importantly accuracy will determine your score.

Controls:

Dive forward
W / Gamepad D-Pad Up

Turn
A S / Gamepad D-Pad Left Right

Restart
R / Gamepad Select

Pause
Esc / P / Gamepad Start
